pylapp.smoothclicker.android.tools

Class ShakeToClean

  • java.lang.Object
    • pylapp.smoothclicker.android.tools.ShakeToClean

  • public class ShakeToClean
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which shows features for a Shake To Clean service.

    17/03/2016
    Version:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    pylapp
    See Also:
